column1: Les différentes parties du paragraphe (£ pour un retour à la ligne)

! I’ve heard that you found a place in Dear Inc.! Woah, lucky you! You’ll probably learn stuff every day, now that you get to answer people’s questions, and counsel them… I read in the newspapers that your company has an enormous database!££

I thought that Dear Inc. had experts for every field of service they offer… You still didn’t tell me what was yours, right? :P££But alright, keep your secrets. For such a job, I won't be surprised if you have some very super-special confidentiality clauses.£
£Oh, yeah, I gave your mail to Mom. We’ll see each other next Christmas, right? :)£
See ya next time,£Your awesome big sis
